baay.description: Baay Eco‑Studios is an exclusive development of 44 ocean-view units, designed to offer a high-quality residential experience with ecological sensitivity. Certified under the EDGE standard, it features technology that optimizes energy, water, and materials usage through simple yet effective strategies. This ensures a minimum 20% savings in each of these areas without compromising comfort or style. Built with full respect for the environment, Baay sets a new paradigm of sustainability and well-being in Playa del Carmen.

brahma.description: Brahma is an exclusive luxury apartment development located in the heart of Selvazama, Tulum. Designed for those seeking a sophisticated lifestyle in harmony with nature, Brahma offers premium finishes, contemporary architecture, and wellness-focused amenities. It’s an ideal investment both for living and high-end rentals.
brahma.delivery: 2025 - December. Tower B and Tower C.

xanbel.description: Xanbel, meaning 'slow' in Mayan, invites you to embrace slow living in the heart of Selvazama. These high-end villas are designed for conscious families who prioritize sustainability, multicultural safety, and constant connection with nature, without giving up comfort or contemporary design. Exclusive villas that combine signature architecture, high-end natural finishes, and a design that honors the essence of Tulum. Spacious, private, and elegant spaces immersed in Selvazama’s jungle. For those who seek luxury, but also connection and peace.

sculptural.name: Sculptural Homes
sculptural.description: Ultra-exclusive project of only 3 residences, each with a unique circular design, over 550 m² of construction and premium amenities (stone pool, paddle tennis, garden, outdoor gym, mini-golf…). For those seeking maximum privacy, elegance, and an architectural masterpiece in harmony with the jungle. Only 3 homes, 3 masterpieces. Each with a distinct, organic, sculptural architectural design that dialogues with Selvazama’s jungle. Fluid spaces, curves that embrace natural light, and aesthetics that turn luxury into a sensory experience. More than homes: living works of art.
